long_description: The women's Momentum Pathfinder II watch sports a clean design and lightweight titanium construction. It's your ticket to adventure! Straightforward analog display features a date window and accurate quartz movement; luminous hands and markers are easy to read, day or night. Solid titanium case is lightweight and strong; antiglare mineral crystal is heat tempered for impact resistance. Stylish leather band is comfortable and durable. The Momentum Pathfinder II watch is water resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The women's Momentum Pathfinder II watch sports a clean design and lightweight titanium construction. It's your ticket to adventure!
